Who is this course for and why you should take it (in 1 minute):

Hello and welcome to the Course, where I’ll take you through the entire process of launching your brand, business, or promote yourself, from scratch. This certified course is for you that seeks to improve your overall skills on the social media and get advantage of the best practices used by experts. Throughout the course we will cover techniques used by marketing professionals, and walk you through a step-by-step process for launching a massive social campaign online that will bring you results and allows you to interact with your audience, and… I’ll even include a few “secrets of the pros.”

--------

For every business, the key to success is knowing your customers. Social media makes this easier than ever. Social media has also the ability to divide industries, with outdated companies falling behind their competitors, so, it's time for you to get with the program and bring yourself up to speed, or you will risk falling behind your competition.

Do you:

  • Want to launch a successful campaign that works and brings you results and increase profits?
  • Make an effective presence online for you or your business?
  • Turn your brand recognizable Worldwide?
  • Increase your online exposure and interact with clients and potential clients on the social sites?

Then this is the right course for you.

On this Certified Course you will learn to launch a successful campaign using some techniques that only a limited of people uses, and you will have access.

Social media marketing is one of the most important parts of marketing strategies. Businesses all over the world are discovering the ways social media can contribute to the success and growth in all areas of their companies.

It allows businesses to easily field customers comments, questions and concerns instantaneously. Customers want to be assured that if they have a problem, they can easily be helped.

Here are some reasons why social media marketing is your best bet for a marketing campaign launch:

  1. People are receptive to your messages
  2. It will generate you more sales
  3. You will see your target market, up close and personal
  4. Customers you didn't know existed will find (and buy from) you
  5. It's as free as air
  6. You can respond to problems immediately
  7. Your competitors are Tweeting and Facebooking in social sites like crazy
  8. You will find customers you didn't know existed

As a learning objective at the end of this Certified Course, you will be able to launch a successful campaign for hundreds or thousands of people if you want, using the tools mentioned within the course. For that, you must have clear what your campaign will be about and also everything that you will need like photos, logos, texts, videos…
